arts.ttl: 'Made the difference': Andoni Iraola says 'unbelievable' player was the real reason why Liverpool won last night
Opinion: Arne Slot can think about dropping Liverpool star who Jamie Carragher called 'absolutely awful' v Bournemouth
arts.sum: Liverpool won 4-2 in the Premier League against Bournemouth, but Jamie Carragher was not happy with one player in the fixture. Despite making it hard...

arts.ttl: Saturday’s briefing: Alleged racist abuse of Antoine Semenyo mars Liverpool win
arts.sum: The Premier League will launch a full investigation after the game was briefly halted in the first half.

arts.ttl: Antoine Semenyo breaks silence after he was allegedly racially abused against Liverpool - as he responds to ANOTHER vile racist comment from sick troll
arts.sum: What was a thoroughly entertaining game was arguably overshadowed by the shocking alleged racist abuse, which occurred in the 28th minute as the Cherries winger went to take a throw-in.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot makes heartbreaking Diogo Jota admission after Liverpool's win over Bournemouth
arts.sum: On Friday, Liverpool played their first Premier League game since the death of Diogo Jota, who tragically died in a car crash alongside his brother earlier this summer

arts.ttl: Liverpool's new signings graded: How Hugo Ekitike, Florian Wirtz, Jeremie Frimpong and Milos Kerkez got on in their Premier League debuts for the champions against Bournemouth
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ANFIELD: Liverpool made history at Anfield on Friday night as they became the first reigning champions to name as many as four Premier League debutants in their opening-day side.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher gives major reason why Liverpool 'WON'T win the league' unless they fix glaring flaw - after conceding twice to Bournemouth
arts.sum: The Reds opened their Premier League campaign with a 4-2 victory over the Cherries, but it was far from plain sailing.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-2 Bournemouth (15 de Ago., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Bournemouth captain ‘shocked’ and ‘angry’ after Antoine Semenyo reports racist abuse in Liverpool match at Anfield
arts.sum: Liverpool’s opening win over Bournemouth was marred by an incident of racist abuse which brought the game to a halt

arts.ttl: Six-goal spectacular overshadowed by alleged racism as Liverpool sink Bournemouth
arts.sum: Premier League champions Liverpool survive a monumental scare to kick off their title defence with a 4-2 win over Bournemouth, in a game that is overshadowed by an incident of alleged racism.
